title: Design and Operational Strategies for Online Discussions in Hybrid Education

context.prior_knowledge: Practical experience in social fields and basic digital literacy
context.additional_context: Hybrid education model operating asynchronous discussion activities in smartphone-based limited-technology environments, applying a continuous improvement process centered on formative assessment

learning_goals: Learners can generate structured online discussion threads at least three times based on social studies practice cases
Learners can provide at least one feedback (question/comment/experience sharing) on peers' posts when participating in asynchronous discussions in mobile environments
Learners can classify at least two effective communication strategies in blended learning environments based on online discussion experiences.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
